author: COMSOL
description: This example calculates the spectral properties of a 3D optical ring resonator. The model demonstrates how to use parts from the Wave Optics Parts Library and how to set up the Field Continuity boundary condition at boundaries, where there is a jump in the predefined phase approximation.
label: optical_ring_resonator_3d.mph
name: root

settings.name: commentsinfile
settings.value:
Rectangular Waveguide Straight-to-Ring Coupler

Rectangular waveguide coupling between a straight and a ring waveguide section. Can be used for waveguides with cores embedded in homogeneous or layered inhomogeneous cladding.
